module.name: PIN Sets
module.description: Allow creation of lists of PINs (numbers for passwords) that can be used by other modules (eg, trunks).
module.changelog: *13.0.8* FREEPBX-12800 macro-pinsets does not work for non-cdr *13.0.7* FREEPBX-11397 still referencing old value for some reason *13.0.6* FREEPBX-11397 FREEPBX-11397 Pass v option to reset CDR to keep custom vars *13.0.5* Lowercase opening PHP tag for consistancy *13.0.4* FREEPBX-10652 Use correct directory for passwords *13.0.3* FREEPBX-10239 Fix pinless dialing *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-9039 Remove Departments from FreePBX *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *2.11.0.8* FREEPBX-7745 Wording consistency: add password Set *2.11.0.7* FREEPBX-7908 readjust priorities *2.11.0.6* #7885 *2.11.0.5* #1953 *2.11.0.4* Include license file *2.11.0.3* Update to use ::create() call. *2.11.0.2* Fix pinsets_get_config hook error *2.11.0.1* #6653 *2.11.0.0* method priority for pinset pro *2.10.0.2* #5597 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
